Question
========
Suppose a researcher wants to test whether the average number of hours
that young people listen to music is higher than 8 hours per week. Which
statistical technique or test is most suitable for testing this?

Answerlist
----------
* One-sample t-test
* Independent t-test
* Chi-square test
* Bivariate regression
